message.content:
cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.DM. 

The paper deals with election systems and scoring rules, which are topics in game theory (cs.GT) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of families of vectors and the investigation of different models for defining pure scoring rules suggest a focus on data structures and algorithms (cs.DS) and machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the study of the descriptive richness of different models and the proof of some restrictions losing generality suggest a focus on discrete mathematics (cs.DM).
